About Prices FAQ Catalog

Lilac Bird is a new way to make playtime easier

With our montly membership, rent toys your little one(s) will love in a cost efficient, storage reducing and environmentally friendly way.

Get Started

It works pretty much
well!

1. Subscribe

Much better than the supermarket! Our membership is only €20 and it gives you a coupon with €120, every month.

2. Choose

Our catalog is awesome! We have more than 200 unique toys for kids between 3 and 8 years old.

3. Play

This is the best part! Kids know how to do it. You can keep toys as long as little ones want.

4. Repeat

No boring stuff! As soon as the kid is ready to explore new toys, just return what you have and choose new ones.

Priscilla Watson

Lilac Bird Creator. Mother

Highest cleaning standards

We use ultrasonic baths and clean toys with non-toxic, environmentally friendly, anti-bacterial cleaning products.

Play with an impact

Sharing is caring! It's an important life skill for toddlers, children, and grown-ups alike. By using Lilac Bird, you protect our planet with fewer toys in landfills.

We’are launching in April. Please, provide us your email address to be the first one who will be happy to use Lilac Bird service.
